title: Heâ€™s an Outspoken Defender of Meat. Industry Funds His Research, Files Show.
description: A UC Davis professor runs an academic center that was conceived by a trade group, according to records, and gets most of its funding from farming interests.
dc:creator: Hiroko Tabuchi
media:credit: Allison V. Smith for The New York Times
media:description: Critics say close financial ties between the Clear Center at UC Davis and the industry it studies create the potential for conflict of interest.
